Name: Banana
Description: A yellow fruit with a peel.

Name: Orange
Description: A round fruit with orange color.

Name: Grape
Description: A small fruit usually found in bunches.

Name: Bicycle
Description: A two-wheeled vehicle powered by pedals.

Name: Train
Description: A long vehicle that runs on tracks.

Name: Bus
Description: A large vehicle used for public transportation.

Name: Basketball
Description: A sport played with a ball and a hoop.

Name: Tennis
Description: A sport played with a racket and a ball.

Name: Swimming
Description: A sport or activity of moving through water.
